name: Project Wyvern
description:
Project Wyvern is a semester long research project developed at the University of Michigan focused on accessibility in gaming, specifically virtual reality. I developed a system to allow a player control over the game space only using their head, opening up more possibilities for disabled gamers to interact with the VR world. It features a few different levels to show off the tools developed throughout the semester.

You can see a quick summary here! You can also read my full semesters dev blog here!
